name: The Lalit Laxmi Vilas Palace Udaipur

reviews.text: Amazing service and hospitality...smiling faces ready to help you....it was very valuable and value for money..excellent breakfast and scenery from the hotel was great...
reviews.title: Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: all in all a great package....would love to stay here again
reviews.title: Royal Feeling!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a small palace converted and restored into a hotel. Overlooking the Fateh Sagar Lake the view from the room is pretty good. Even though we were staying in a valley view room, the mountain range beyond the city was looking good.
reviews.title: Ideal For Hospitality

reviews.text: The rooms are extremely well kept and are huge enough to accomodate 3 adults. The ethnic touch on the walls, and the furniture look welcoming.
reviews.title: Great view of FatehSagar Lake

reviews.text: Though the hotel does not have many sporting activities apart from a snooker table and a carrom board, however they make it up by offerring an evening folk dance, horse dance etc by their lawn which is a good thing.
reviews.title: average
A place worth staying at
reviews.text: Nice rooms, especially if you get a lake view, friendly service and clean. The WIFI was the most expensive I paid in the 3 weeks I was travelling and the restaurant is a little expensive, on the other hand the food was very good.
All in all a great place to stay
reviews.title: OK Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My experience at the hotel wasn't very pleasant. It seemed that we were the only guests at the hotel, almost nobody at the restaurants and at the bar at all times. Food wasn't goood, however the restaurant staff was very helpful and pleasant. A bit far from the palace, but beautiful views of the lake. Definetely it lacks a swimming pool to relax after sightseeing during the day. I wouldn't stay again.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Excellent location and marvellous view. No negative aspects except for the expansion which may undertake a year or so. I think it's the best properties of lalit group. Swimming pool and spa, along with some more rooms are planned in the expansion. So, once it's completed it'll be THE best property in Udaipur.
reviews.title: A Royal Experience !!!

reviews.text: It is a small property but very well maintained. Staff very helpful and courteous. Very beautiful view of Fatehpur Sagar Lake right from the window of your room with mountains all around. As we went in October all the mountains were lush green and lake overflowing...... throughout the hotel you see beautiful pictures of Royals and Chandeliers to match ......Yes there is one Dancing horse !!! literally he dances to the music...they visit the Hotel everyday.....and the Bagpiper Band and there is even a puppet show for children..... Nice in house reastaurant Padmini.....In all nice Hotel so have some peace and quite on a vacation
reviews.title: YEAH FEEL LIKE KING

reviews.text: We recently spent two nights in this beautiful property. We had lake view rooms and the view was amazing. The rooms were spacious and beautiful. We ate in the outdoor restaurant and the food was gorgeous Only downside is the lack of a swimming pool. The staff were lovely. Really enjoyed our stay here.
reviews.title: Beautiful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is well located at fatehpur lake. Staff was excellent, food was excellent. We were on our honeymoon trip and staff ensured our pleasant stay from our welcome till our departure from the hotel. they daily have some activities which keeps you occupied. Would like to visit again :).
reviews.title: Great experience

reviews.text: Me and my family stayed here for 02 Nights and crossed by some important factors which actually made this place as an outstanding place for Unwind and leisure experience such as Courteous staff, Impeccable service and of course the way they treat .
reviews.title: Marvellous Space to unwind yourself

reviews.text: Will definitely come back and suggest this place to others..........
reviews.title: Stay at Lalit Laxmi Vilas Palace

reviews.text: Well appointed rooms, comfortable stay. Very well trained courteous staff. Food costs are unreasonably high. They must work to make it competitive. I liked staying here. The palace is up on a hill and gives wonderful view of the city and the lake. The hotel is located in the heart of the city, hence very easy to find: ask for Chetak Circle and the rest is just taking a turn uphill and reaching there. Manned by good people who appear to know their job and are friendly. Very safe for family and children.
reviews.title: Most Memorizing Experience

reviews.text: I choose this hotel for a week end trip with family, we reached there around 9.30 PM totally exhausted after 5 hour drive. Check In experience was not that good. The guy at check in was busy catering another guest and have not even bothered to say hello, he kept us waiting for 10 min and than started working on our check-in only when i asked him. Room was large but was very basic, nothing special about it, bathroom was small.
reviews.title: Good Location but Average Experince

reviews.text: Morning view was absolutely awesome, the lake view from room and porch is unforgettable experience, every body staying here must take lake side room (it cost little extra) and must have morning team around porch.
reviews.title: Amazing Location Average Rooms

reviews.text: Restaurant is very expensive everything is overly charged. The problem with this hotel is it is neither modern nor heritage and it lies some where in middle which makes experience bad.
reviews.title: palace on hill

reviews.text: However staff is very good, house keeping is good, location is peaceful and awesome, my check-out experience was good.
reviews.title: Excellent wow!!!

reviews.text: My stay at this hotel was very average simply because the base category room of this very nice heritage palace hotel was very average....the room was big in size with all the amenities but it appeared very basic with a very average decor. The rooms are neither contemporary nor heritage which says it all. The suite category rooms are good though but they are very few and quite expensive for their price. The palace hotel does make you feel good with its royal elevation and its location over a hill overlooking the beautiful fatehsagar lake is a big plus point but it disappoints in term of comfort and even lacks a swimming pool. Service quality of the hotel is good and so is the Multi Cuisine restaurant which is quite nice.
reviews.title: Review

aka: The Lalit Laxmi Vilas Palace Udaipur Hotel Udaipur
